key_risks: Regulatory and geopolitical risks due to operations in highly regulated and politically unstable regions
High financial leverage from capital expenditures for renewable projects
Market volatility from fluctuations in energy prices and demand
Legal risks from allegations of intellectual property infringement
controversies: Allegations of intellectual property infringement by Silicon Valley billionaire Thomas Siebel
Criticism from environmental groups over continued use of fossil fuels
environmental_issues: Continued use of fossil fuels despite renewable energy focus
